[`object GameCenterAchievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievement)The data structure that represents a Game Center achievement resource.[`object GameCenterAchievementCreateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementcreaterequest)A request body you use to create a Game Center achievement.[`object GameCenterAchievementGroupAchievementLinkageRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementgroupachievementlinkagerequest)The request body you use to attach an achievement to an achievement group.[`object GameCenterAchievementGroupAchievementLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementgroupachievementlinkageresponse)A response body that contains the ID of a single related resource.[`object GameCenterAchievementResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementresponse)A response that contains a single Game Center achievement resource.[`object GameCenterAchievementUpdateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementupdaterequest)The request body you use to update a Game Center achievement.[`object GameCenterAchievementsResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementsresponse)A response that contains a list of Game Center achievement resources.[`object GameCenterAchievementLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementlocalizationslinkagesresponse)[`object GameCenterAchievementReleasesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementreleaseslinkagesresponse)[`object StringToStringMap`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/stringtostringmap)
